doc.after: From its roots culture in German states has been shaped by major intellectual and popular currents in Europe both religious and secular Historically Germany has been called Das Land der Dichter und Denker the land of poets and thinkers 194 because of the major role its writers and philosophers have played in the development of Western thought and culture 195
